about_p1: I am Jesús Martín Zorrilla, a computer engineer. I consider myself a responsible, organized, and committed person in everything I do.
about_p2: I have worked as React developer and now I am working as iOS developer. Thanks to my curiosity and professional experience, I feel that I can achieve everything I set my mind to.
